page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CLAIRE
page.content: I get up and get ready for school. My older sister goes to Bottisham Village College, my younger sister and I go to Swaffham Prior School. I walk to school. There are 24 children in my class, 12 3rd years and 12 4th years. On summer mornings we go swimming in groups in the school pool. At playtime I have skipping competitions with my friend. In the afternoon we have crafts . Some Mums and local ladies come in to help. Some of us are knitting jumpers for children in Ethiopia. We have over 50 so far. I go home and watch TV. I go swimming in Bottisham Pool
